page.title: 15LIFE IN FOREST TOWN
page.content: In Forest Town there are a lot of houses. In the Avenues there are very old houses but the young people, when they come to live here, do the houses up. They look very nice now. When young people move here they have children. More children mean more schools. I think most people live in style but some cannot afford it. When we do the shopping most people go to Tesco if they need a lot of things. But if you need small things you shop in Forest Town. There are two paper shops, one chemist, one pub and some others. The pub is called the Prince Charles. There are lots of places for enjoyment. You can go to the pub. You can go to the Kingsway Hall for a dance or drink. You can have a meal. I think it is very good in Forest Town. {CLAIR LAIT
